Title: The Deming Birdseye Performance Knit Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This sophisticated birdseye knit is a favorite of the season The smooth cotton feels your favorite tee and looks just as sharp as the rest of our collection Perfect for travel or long days in the office The Deming will stretch and move with you throughout the day Finished with features like a french placket and the Ledbury Alden collar you’ll look sharp and stay comfortable no matter the occasion Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>
Tags: ledbury, fall-collection, 50off, alden, all-shirts, bf, bfcm, birdseye, black, casual-shirt, classic, clothing-tax, cotton, exclusion-promo, fall, fall-collection, knit, msrp, msrp-shirt, new-arrivals, numeric, ri_collection:ri-subtle-patterns, sale, shirt, size, size, size, size, size, size, standard, standard-promo, stl:the-black-deming-birdseye-jersey-casual-shirt, stl:the-olivine-richmond-chino-pant, tailored, visible, winter-sale

Title: The Grey Barfield Gingham Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>One of our designer’s favorites This color-on-color gingham has great visual character and variation Crafted from a European-milled lightweight poplin you can wear The Barfield now and layer effortlessly later in the season Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Navy Randolph Flannel Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Arguably the most popular flannel of 2018 The Randolph is back for another season Heavy-weight twill is woven with mouline and heather yarns creating loads of color variation that looks just as soft as it is Wear as a base shirt or second layer when the mercury drops Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Navy Gibbs Flannel Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The classic Blackwatch plaid is a fall/winter must We crafted the Gibbs flannel out of a compact and dense twill It is lightly brushed for softness and wears a bit like a work shirt This durable style is easy-going and perfect for the cool crisp air of fall Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Blue Tucker Check Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The classics never fade A crisp check is the perfect start to the fall season Constructed with an ultra-compact fine twill The Tucker Check is lightweight and soft A fine yarn size means this timeless shirt is great for layering with a sweater or sport coat throughout the season without overheating Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Winhall Print Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Winhall Print Dress Shirt features a dark blue melange heathered base fabric and a black geometric micro pattern Pair with your favorite sport coat for an elevated look Constructed from 100 cotton sourced from luxury Spanish mill Sidogras Features a Ledbury Spread collar and double-barrel cuffs with reinforced buttons Tailored fit features a darted back for a more tailored fit around the torso Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Spanish mill Sidogras Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a tailored fit throughout the torso Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Lavender Freeman Oxford Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This is one of our favorites The Freeman is an oxford that boasts an incredibly smooth hand and light weight With subtle visual texture and year-round colors this polished style is perfect for any formal or business occasion A perfect wear-now shirt that will layer seamlessly later in the season Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Mid-spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a tailored fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Pale Pink Kimball Check Dress Shirt - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>An essential for your business rotation Crafted with lightweight twill this micro-windowpane is incredibly soft and will hold its shape throughout the day If you’re looking for an all-star addition to your wardrobe this is it Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Mid-spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Red Tucker Check Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The classics never fade A crisp check is the perfect start to the fall season Constructed with an ultra-compact fine twill The Tucker Check is lightweight and soft A fine yarn size means this timeless shirt is great for layering with a sweater or sport coat throughout the season without overheating Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Navy Brompton Printed Corduroy Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This artistic style is for those who want to stand apart without standing out Constructed with a fine-wale baby corduroy from Albini this lightweight style is perfect for early fall Featuring a printed paisley pattern a French placket and our versatile Alden collar The Brompton is ready for just about any occasion Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Albini in Bergamo Italy Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons:Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Dark Blue Heather Crosswell Brushed Gingham Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Sometimes the best things are the simplest things This classic gingham was designed with that in mind Super compact twill earns this gingham its lightweight and soft feel Crafted for early in the season or layering this twill won’t sweat before it gets cold Finished with a light ‘peaching to create a soft hand a french placket and the brand new Ledbury Quintessential Collar to ensure you’re fit for every occasion Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Quintessential collar The perfect multi-purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid-spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Light Blue Corbly Gingham Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Light Blue Corbly Gingham features a perfect color scheme to transition from Spring to Fall This oxford shirt features a tonal light blue gingham pattern on a white background This crisp shirt is constructed from 100 basket weave cotton Available in three colors Currant Light Blue and Cedar Finished with the Ledbury Spread collar and single-barrel cuffs with reinforced buttons Tailored fit features a darted back for a more tailored fit around the torso Fabric:100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a tailored fit throughout the torso Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect "V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Light Blue Corbly Gingham Dress Shirt - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Light Blue Corbly Gingham features a perfect color scheme to transition from Spring to Fall This oxford shirt features a tonal light blue gingham pattern on a white background This crisp shirt is constructed from 100 basket weave cotton Available in three colors Currant Light Blue and Cedar Finished with the Ledbury Spread collar and single-barrel cuffs with reinforced buttons Tailored fit features a darted back for a more tailored fit around the torso Fabric:100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a tailored fit throughout the torso Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect "V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>
Tags: ledbury, fall-collection, 50off, all-shirts, blue, bundle, business-casual, check, classic, color_option:#c0d5f4:the-light-blue-corbly-gingham-dress-shirt, cotton, dress-shirt, dress-shirts, exclusion-promo, fall-collection, fit-classic, fit-guide, fit-slim, gingham-collection, light-blue, msrp, msrp-shirt, new-fall-arrivals, numeric, oxford, pattern, ri_collection:ri-business-casual, sale, shirt, size, slim, spread, standard, standard-promo, stl:arlington-belt, stl:the-navy-richmond-chino-pant, tailored, visible, winter-sale

Title: The Navy Brenton Check Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This transitional style is one of our favorites This visually textured fabric alternates between plain weave and end-on-end to create the check The variation in the color creates a patchwork-like effect Mid-weight and smooth you’ll reach for this shirt during the workweek and on the weekend Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Cadet Blue Tennyson Plaid Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Back by popular demand this autumn inspired plaid is seasonal all-star Crafted with lightly brushed cotton The Tennyson feels like your favorite flannel But thanks to its lightweight basketweave it becomes a wear-now style that will layer perfectly under a sport coat or sweater later in the season And with some variation in the plaid this plaid has subtle visual texture to keep things interesting Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Lavender Babar Check Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>A classic perfected The Babar Check is a traditional Prince of Wales check woven from a rich 100’s 2-ply twill Elevated in look and feel effortlessly move from the office to happy hour in this classic Striking the perfect balance in fabric weight this business shirt is ideal for transitioning from summer to fall Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Mid-spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Plum Torello Check Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Plum Torello Check captures the essence of the cooler months with its classic moody hue This plum navy and black check shirt is constructed from a mix of heathered and mouline yarns creating a perfectly faded appearance This check shirt feels like an ultra-lightweight flannel because of its lightly brushed twill weave Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Portuguese mill Somelos Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Cedar Kerley Plaid Casual Shirt - Classic

Title: The Pumpkin Blaine Check Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Early fall calling This flannel is impossibly light and brushed to soft and smooth perfection Our friends at the historic Italian mill Canclini hit this compact twill out of the park Colors that bring thoughts of fallen leaves and crisp air are just what we needed The Blaine is a wear-now style that will layer perfectly when the temperature drops Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Canclini in Italy Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Red Maxwell Check Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>A fall favorite is back The Maxwell Check has been a best-seller with good reason 100 cotton herringbone is lightly brushed to create an incredibly soft mid-weight fabric Pair that will classic colors that will never go out of style and you have an instant classic Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>
Tags: ledbury, fall-collection, 40off, all-shirts, bf, button-down, casual-shirt, classic, clothing-tax, color_option:#257e6a:the-forest-maxwell-check-casual-shirt, color_option:#ce0000:the-red-maxwell-check-casual-shirt, cotton, exclusion-promo, fall-2, fall-collection, flannel-collection, herringbone, msrp, msrp-shirt, new-arrivals, numeric, red, remove-klevu, ri-bold-patterns, ri_collection:ri-bold-patterns, sale, shirt, shorten, size, size, size, size, size, standard, standard-promo, stl:arlington-belt, stl:the-navy-franklin-5-pocket-corduroy-pant, tailored, visible, winter-sale

Title: The Red Maloney Flannel Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This flannel is ready for winter Our friends at the historic Japanese mill Kuwamura Co finished this mid-weight plain weave with a rich brushing The result is a super soft flannel that looks as good as it feels Its deep navy and red pattern remind us of classic buffalo check flannels from the old days Pair with a sweater on a brisk day or wear as a second layer earlier in the season Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Japanese mill Kuwamura Co Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons:Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Navy Kenesaw Flannel Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This Portuguese-milled flannel is our head designer’s favorite The oversized check and mid-weight plain weave give The Kenesaw an old-school woodsy look Plus the brushed cotton is so soft you’ll reach for this classic style all season long Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Somelos in Portugal Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Navy Diggs Flannel Casual Shirt - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>One of the more unique flannels of the season The Diggs is crafted from a weighty twill It is woven with lots of space between the yarn lending a surprisingly airy feel despite the weight of the yarn Featuring two flap pockets on the chest and the Ledbury Alden collar this versatile shirt is perfect as a second layer to throw on when it gets cool Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Portuguese mill Somelos Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons:Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Air Force Blue Lipscombe Flannel Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Sometimes you just want an easy-wearing shirt that goes with anything Enter The Lipscombe Flannel This subdued low-contrast plaid is just the shirt Crafted with a mid-weight twill that is ever-so-slightly brushed The Lipscombe is a wear-now style that will layer easily with a sweater or sport coat later on in the season Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Deep Blue Mathews Corduroy Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Mathews is one of our absolute favorites Featuring a buttery-soft baby corduroy from the Spanish mill Sidogras this lightweight style is the ideal fall casual shirt Pair with our Franklin Fit 5-Pockets or your favorite pair of jeans and you’ve got a can’t-lose look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Sidogras in Barcelona Spain Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Slate Cutler Washed Twill Casual Shirt - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Denim never fades…out of style that is This washed twill has a slate color that is perfectly broken in Best of all the fabric will only get softer and softer and the color will fade unique to the wearer Features like a Ledbury Alden collar and a French placket elevate this casual style Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>
Tags: ledbury, fall-collection, 40off, alden, all-shirts, black, casual-shirt, classic, clothing-tax, cotton, exclusion-promo, fall, fall-collection, msrp, msrp-shirt, new-arrivals, numeric, ri_collection:ri-subtle-patterns, sale, shirt, size, size, standard, standard-promo, stl:arlington-belt, stl:the-sand-franklin-5-pocket-corduroy-pant, sunday-shirting, tailored, twill, visible, winter-sale

Title: The Dark Blue Heather Ryan Brushed Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Introducing flannel perfection This Portuguese brushed twill features heather yarn that lends visual interest to this solid A button-down collar and French placket elevate this style above the rest no slouchy flannel here Plus this lightly brushed style is unbelievably soft and is light enough for wear early in the season Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Vilarinho in Portugal Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons:Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Washed Blue Indigo Arnett Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>You all loved this shirt so much we brought it back for another season Crafted from a mid-weight texture weave The Arnett has a rich indigo dye that will fade beautifully over time Ideal for casual Friday and into the weekend this casual style is one of our favorites Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Hand wash separately in sink prior to laundering to prevent color transfer Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Dark Blue Arjun Windowpane Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>We admit we have an affinity for blues The Arjun is no exception Crafted with a lightweight twill from the Spanish mill Sidogras this soft blue features a light blue windowpane in the foreground Pair with a zip sweater or sport coat for an easy-wearing fall look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Sidogras in Barcelona Spain Collar The brand new Ledbury Quintessential collar the perfect multi-purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid-spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons:Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Baylis Indigo Dot Casual Shirt - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This is no ordinary indigo The denim experts at Albiate crafted this dobby weave with jacquard dots and then dyed it with true indigo The result is a rich deep blue with a smooth yet textured feel Featuring our ever versatile Alden collar and a french placket to keep things contemporary Best of all the indigo will fade in a way unique to the wearer over time Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Albiate in Italy Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect "V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Hand wash separately in sink prior to laundering to prevent color transfer Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Izard Performance Knit Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Softer than your favorite tee and just as sharp as the rest of our collection The Izard Knit features a subtle honeycomb-like texture on it’s face and is incredibly soft This shirt is perfect for travel or long days in the office and will stretch and move with you throughout the day Finished with features like a french placket and the Ledbury Alden collar you’ll look sharp and stay comfortable no matter the occasion Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Light Blue Crockett Brushed Herringbone Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Introducing your new favorite shirt The Crockett Brushed Herringbone is the softest dress shirt you’ll own Crafted from an incredibly soft herringbone this heather fabric has loads of visual interest We’d pair it with our Richmond chinos in Navy or Iron for an in-season business look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Sometimes the best things are the simplest things This classic gingham was designed with that in mind Super compact twill earns this gingham its lightweight and soft feel Crafted for early in the season or layering this twill won’t sweat before it gets cold Finished with a light ‘peaching to create a soft hand a french placket and the brand new Ledbury Quintessential Collar to ensure you’re fit for every occasion Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Quintessential collar The perfect multi-purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid-spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Light Blue Heather Bos Check Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Early fall calling This flannel is impossibly light and brushed to soft and smooth perfection Our friends at the historic Italian mill Canclini hit this compact twill out of the park All-year colors that will pair with the rich colors of fall are just what we needed The Bos is a wear-now style that will layer perfectly when the temperature drops Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Canclini in Italy Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Blue Heather Karawan Flannel Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Introducing one of our softest flannels From the legendary craftspeople at Thomas Mason this rich herringbone is mid-weight and ready for cold weather Featuring lighter subdued accents and a heather-blue background this plaid is unlike most fall flannels Pair with some dark denim or a pair of moleskins to complete the look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from the historic Thomas Mason mill Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons:Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Loden Heather Heyming Moleskin Casual Shirt - Tailored

Title: The Navy Anderson Fine Twill Stripe Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>It’s time to upgrade your stripe Crafted from ultra-fine 100s singles twill this fabric is incredibly lightweight and soft Detailed with a guarded stripe the border of the stripe is solid while the interior is a mix of white and blue With an elevated feel and a classic stripe you’ll find just about any occasion to wear this wardrobe winner Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Mid-spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Navy Reed Check Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Get ready to give your old check a run for the money The Reed Check is a classic check with subtle updates Crafted with ultra-fine 100s singles twill this compact weave leaves you with a smooth hand and an ideal weight for a dress shirt This wear-now style is ready to finish summer off strong and will layer seamlessly later in the season Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Mid-spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Light Blue Kent Sport Texture Dress Shirt - Classic

Title: The White Ashby Stripe Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>We can almost guarantee you don’t have a shirt like The Ashby Stripe This classic thin stripe from Albini has been updated with a twist An airy dobby weave lends the shirt some texture and personality while also making it more breathable The deep blue stripe is the perfect business shirt for early fall when some added personality is welcome Layer under a solid sport coat and pair with a subtly patterned silk tie for a refined professional look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Albini in Italy Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Oxblood Franklin  5-Pocket Moleskin Pant
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>A slim fit moleskin pant that you can still move around in Moleskin gets its distinct plush hand feel from its unique construction While it may seem similar to brushed finishes it is actually a type of pile fabric that is sheared at the finishing stage similar to corduroy or velvet The end result is unbelievably soft and the perfect weight for fall and winter Fabric 98 Cotton with 2 Comfort Stretch Fit Slim fit Inseam 33-inch inseam Rise Mid-rise Machine wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Iron on low medium heat Pants can be professionally dry cleaned.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Charcoal Franklin 5-Pocket Moleskin Pant
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>A slim fit moleskin pant that you can still move around in Moleskin gets its distinct plush hand feel from its unique construction While it may seem similar to brushed finishes it is actually a type of pile fabric that is sheared at the finishing stage similar to corduroy or velvet The end result is unbelievably soft and the perfect weight for fall and winter Fabric 98 Cotton with 2 Comfort Stretch Fit Slim fit Inseam 33-inch inseam Rise Mid-rise Machine wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Iron on low medium heat Pants can be professionally dry cleaned.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Cadet Blue Sheffield Sport Coat - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>It’s likely you won’t have one of these in your wardrobe already This rich wide wale corduroy has nostalgic yet refined character Hailing from corduroy and velvet specialists at a near two-century old mill in Italy you can be sure this is some of the best around The medium blue color has an elegant appearance Wear to your next fall wedding or party Available exclusively in our slim fit Unlined to offer perfect fit and finished with double vents two patch pockets and a welt pocket on the left chest Fabric 80 Cotton 18 Nylon and 2 Stretch Fit Our new Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is unlined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two button closure Four cuff buttons that can be fully functioning Dry Clean Only.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Light Blue Anderson Fine Twill Stripe Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>It’s time to upgrade your stripe Crafted from ultra-fine 100s singles twill this fabric is incredibly lightweight and soft Detailed with a guarded stripe the border of the stripe is solid while the interior is a mix of white and light blue With an elevated feel and a classic stripe you’ll find just about any occasion to wear this wardrobe winner Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Mid-spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>
Tags: ledbury, fall-collection, all-shirts, blue, bundle, classic, color_option:#3e59a9:the-navy-anderson-fine-twill-stripe-dress-shirt, color_option:#b1deff:the-light-blue-anderson-fine-twill-stripe-dress-shirt, color_option:#d4adf6:the-lavender-anderson-fine-twill-stripe-dress-shirt, cotton, dress-shirt, exclusion-promo, fall, fall-collection, light-blue, mid-spread, msrp, msrp-shirt, numeric, pfs:hidden, pfs:hidden:s, ri_collection:ri-business-casual, ri_collection:ri-dress-shirt, shirt, standard, standard-promo, stl:the-navy-richmond-chino-pant, stripe, twill, visible

Title: The White Bancroft Poplin Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>It's time to rethink what you know about luxury poplin Introducing our most luxurious white shirt yet The Bancroft Poplin is composed of Gatsby Egyptian cotton known for its strength and ultrafine yarn size Renowned Italian mill Thomas Mason grows this incredible cotton on the banks of the Nile River and crafted this rich poplin with an incredibly soft feel and light weight A perfect shirt for any formal or business occasion all year round Features a Ledbury mid-spread collar and double-barrel cuffs with reinforced buttons Tailored fit features a darted back for a more tailored fit around the torso Fabric 100 Egyptian Cotton sourced from luxury Italian mill Thomas Mason Collar The Ledbury Mid-Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a trim fit throughout the torso Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect "V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>
Tags: ledbury, fall-collection, all-shirts, classic, color_option:#ffffff:the-white-bancroft-poplin-dress-shirt, cotton, dress-shirt, dress-shirts, exclusion-promo, fall-collection, mid-spread, msrp, msrp-shirt, numeric, ri_collection:ri-business-casual, ri_collection:ri-dress-shirt, shirt, solid, standard, standard-promo, stl:arlington-belt, stl:the-olivine-richmond-chino-pant, stl:the-white-bancroft-poplin-dress-shirt, sunday-shirting, tailored, visible, white

Title: The Plum Ebury Windowpane Sport Coat - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Time to invest in a game changer The Ebury is just that sport coat With deep plum color featuring a blue windowpane and off-white yarn throughout this style has great visual texture and is an eye-catcher 100 wool from a historic Italian mill keeps this super 130’s twill soft and the perfect weight for fall Guaranteed to come with compliments take our word for it Available exclusively in our slim fit Lined and finished with double vents two flap pockets and a welt pocket on the left chest Made in Italy Fabric 100 Wool Fit Our new Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is unlined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two-button closure Four non-functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Dry Clean Only.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Autumn Orange Kirtland Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Early fall has been made into a shirt The Kirtland is a linen cotton and viscose blend making it perfect for the early days of the season This slubby plain weave is yarn-dyed for a rich lasting color Finished with a chest pocket and torched buttons you’ll be sure fall is here while wearing The Kirtland Fabric 47 Linen 36 Viscose 17 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Raisin Esler Brushed Plaid Casual Shirt - Classic

Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Inspired by fall foliage in the mountains just west of Richmond The Hartmann is a fall all-star Crafted from Portuguese flannel this mid-weight twill is perfect cool crisp days The brushed fabric is full of color variation and is oh-so-soft Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Portuguese mill Somelos Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Navy Locke Sport Coat - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This is one of our absolute favorites Rich Italian wool is woven into an incredibly soft and light twill to craft this navy sport coat The perfect daily driver for an office setting yet able to be dressed up or down with ease A welcome addition to any man’s wardrobe Available exclusively in our slim fit Unlined to offer perfect fit and finished with double vents two patch pockets and a welt pocket on the left chest Made in Italy Fabric 100 Wool Fit Our new Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is unlined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two-button closure Four non-functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Dry Clean Only.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Blue Caldwell Cashmere Herringbone Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This luxurious style is part of our Reserve Collection Crafted with a cotton-cashmere blend the impossibly lightweight and soft herringbone is perfect for cool weather And with a spaced-out weave that creates a lofty feel you can easily throw on a sport coat and tie without overheating Fabric 85 Cotton 15 Cashmere sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The White Kent Sport Texture Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Kent Sport Texture is the shirt for the days when breathability is key This unique 100 cotton weave structure facilitates airflow to keep you cool Finished with our brand new Quintessential collar the collar fit for any occasion Fabric 100 cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The new Ledbury Quintessential collar The perfect multi-purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid-spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Blue Khal Check Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The ultimate business check is here This fabric has an alternating poplin weave that creates a patchwork effect With faded seasonal colors and great visual texture you’ll be sure to turn heads whether at the office or out at happy hour Layer this crisp poplin under a sweater later in the season for the ultimate fall look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s Finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect “V at the neckline and reinforced buttons ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Pink Prestwick Performance Gingham Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This is no ordinary gingham Woven with upgraded performance fabric The Prestwick now features comfort stretch moisture-wicking odor control and wrinkle resistance All without sacrificing the look and comfort of a cotton dress shirt This pink and blue gingham will move with you wherever you go while keeping you looking sharp Fabric 64 cotton 23 poly 11 nylon 2 comfort stretch sourced from the world's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Pink Cloverly Check Dress Shirt - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Give your business dress rotation an upgrade The Cloverly check is woven from 120s doubles ultrafine twill Extremely soft for all-day comfort and compactly woven to prevent a sheer appearance No ordinary check the pattern is created by reversing the twill weave on the warp yarn to create visual interest Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from the world's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Lavender Lewiston Check Dress Shirt - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This compact weave is perfect for transitioning to spring With a light to mid-weight fabric that is soft but clean feeling this dress style won’t overheat once it gets warm A dobby effect in the background add some visual interest in this classic check while the ultra fine yarn mean all-day comfort and an elevated appearance Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from the world's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Mid-spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The White Astor Poplin Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>There’s nothing better than a classic style done right That’s why we created the Astor Poplin Crafted from 100s doubles poplin from Tessitura Monti in Italy this Egyptian cotton poplin is smooth crisp and lightweight This versatile style is bound to become a weekly favorite Fabric 100 cotton sourced from Tessitura Monti in Italy Collar The Quintessential collar The perfect multi-purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid-spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Blue Hudson Pinpoint Oxford Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>If you haven’t experienced a pinpoint Oxford dress shirt now’s the time This pinpoint Oxford is a refined version of your everyday Oxford with a dash of sheen that dresses it up just a bit Striking the perfect balance of weight and feel The Hudson is a lightweight hardy fabric that will reliably stay sharp looking from morning to evening Fabric 100 cotton sourced from Tessitura Monti in Italy Collar The Quintessential collar The perfect multi-purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid-spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>
