Title: White Fine Twill French Cuff Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The White Fine Twill French Cuff is our take on the classic white shirt A necessity in any man's formal wardrobe Finished with a mid-spread collar and French cuffs Tailored fit features a darted back Fabric Italian woven 2-fold extra fine twill Intricate ribbed weave provides just a small bit of texture to enhance the look Very smooth to the touch and easily ironed Collar Mid-Spread Collar A contemporary version of the traditional point collar Cuff French Cuffs Buttons Shell buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Pink Danvers Houndstooth Dress Shirt - Classic

Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The perfect solid non-solid From just a few feet away The Danvers reads as a solid but come closer and you’ll find a classic houndstooth pattern Crafted from 110s doubles twill sourced from Egyptian cotton and woven in Italy this ultra-lightweight fabric is comfortable soft and just right for every occasion Fabric 100 cotton sourced from Tessitura Monti in Italy Collar The Quintessential collar The perfect multi-purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid-spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Blue Coleridge Box Check Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>A simple box check is a must in any man’s wardrobe Crafted from 100s doubles poplin from Tessitura Monti in Italy this Egyptian cotton poplin is smooth crisp and lightweight The Coleridge is a fantastic business shirt for any day of the week Fabric 100 cotton sourced from Tessitura Monti in Italy Collar The Quintessential collar The perfect multi-purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid-spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Blue Drazin Check Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Blue Drazin Check Dress Shirt features a tonal blue check pattern on a white background This shirt is constructed from lightweight but densely woven cotton twill fabric Pair with your favorite Ledbury sport coat or blazer to complete the look Available in Pink and Blue Finished with the Ledbury Spread collar and single-barrel cuffs with reinforced buttons Tailored fit features a darted back for a more tailored fit around the torso Fabric:100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a tailored fit throughout the torso Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect"V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>
Tags: ledbury, dress-shirts, all-shirts, blue, casual-shirt, check, classic, clothing-tax, cotton, dress, dress-shirt, dress-shirts, exclusion-promo, final-sale, fit-classic, fit-guide, fit-slim, light-blue, msrp, msrp-shirt, new-arrivals, new-fall-arrivals, newmd, numeric, pattern, perfect-pairings, pfs:hidden, pfs:hidden:s, remove-klevu, sale, shirt, size, size, size, size, size, size, slim, spread, standard, standard-promo, tailored, visible, winter-sale

Title: The Slim Fit Barberry Gingham Casual Shirt - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>A red and navy gingham sport shirt with a highly textured mouline weave to give unique texture to your favorite check pattern The slim fit is finished with a button-down collar This shirt features a shortened body allowing the shirt to be worn tucked or untucked Available in slim fit sizes S-XXL Also available in classic fit with an Alden collar Fabric 100 Cotton Mouline Collar Classic Alden Collar Slim Button-Down collar Cuff Single button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and slim fit Buttons Shell buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Dark Blue Dewitt Flannel - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Dewitt Flannel is the perfect casual weekend style for the cooler months.This blue herringbone flannel has navy and turquoise donegal yarns woven throughout creating a speckled appearance Finished with a left chest flap pocket with a functional button closure This heavyweight flannel is constructed from 75 viscose 19 cotton &amp 6 nylon Sourced from luxury Italian mill Albini Finished with the Ledbury Alden collar and a shortened body length allowing the shirt to be worn tucked or untucked Available in classic and tailored fit Fabric 75 viscose 19 cotton &amp 6 nylon sourced from luxury Italian mill Albini Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect ‰ÛÏV at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Ruffin - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Denim fans rejoice The Black Ruffin is your favorite denim sport shirt that has been lightly washed to create slight texture and color variation Finished with a button-down collar and a shortened body allowing the shirt to be worn tucked or untucked Available in slim and classic sizes S-XXL Fabric 100 Cotton Denim Collar Button-down collar Cuff Single button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and slim fit Slim fit features a darted back for a tailored fit throughout the torso Buttons Shell buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Blue McDaniel Chambray Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>A must for every man's closet this blue chambray shirt will quickly become a new favorite Its heathered look gives the shirt the ability to adapt to most color and texture combinations and the Alden collar without collar stays lends a casual air to the shirt This shirt has a shortened body allowing the shirt to be worn untucked Fabric 100 Cotton Chambray Collar Alden collar Cuff Single button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit is undarted Buttons Shell buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The White Mayfield Oxford Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Mayfield Oxford is a classic menswear staple This white oxford shirt will become an easy part of your workwear rotation Constructed from 100 cotton oxford fabric sourced from luxury Portuguese mill Somelos Available in Light Blue Pink &amp White Finished with the Ledbury Button-Down collar and a standard body length Available in classic and tailored fit Fabric 100 cotton sourced from luxury Portuguese mill Somelos Collar The Ledbury Button-Down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect "V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Mayfield Oxford is a classic menswear staple This pink oxford shirt will become an easy part of your workwear rotation Constructed from 100 cotton oxford fabric sourced from luxury Portuguese mill Somelos Available in Light Blue Pink &amp White Finished with the Ledbury Button-Down collar and a standard body length Available in classic and tailored fit Fabric 100 cotton sourced from luxury Portuguese mill Somelos Collar The Ledbury Button-Down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect "V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Light Blue Mayfield Stripe Oxford Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Mayfield Stripe Oxford is a classic menswear staple A traditional Oxford featuring a blue and white stripe and a button collar you’ll find just about any reason to wear The Mayfield Stripe Dressing well doesn’t have to be complex Pair this Oxford with our Franklin 5-pockets for a sharp and casual warm-weather look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from the world's finest mills Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Blue McBride Check Dress Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Blue McBride Check Dress Shirt is a light blue classic dress shirt with a small windowpane check pattern This shirt is constructed from 100 cotton poplin fabric sourced from Europe's finest mills This lightweight shirt is perfect for layering under your favorite Ledbury sport coat or sweater Available in three colors Lilac Blue and Dark Blue Finished with the Ledbury Spread collar and single-barrel cuffs with reinforced buttons Tailored fit features a darted back for a more tailored fit around the torso Fabric:100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a tailored fit throughout the torso Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect "V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Pink Fairford Performance Check Casual Shirt - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Woven with an end-on-end effect this dynamic check features multiple colors throughout the pattern Soft and lightweight this spring style is a versatile comfortable option to transition to warmer weather With an upgraded performance fabric composed of cotton polyester nylon and comfort stretch The Fairford will move with you wherever you go and keep you looking sharp Fabric 64 cotton 23 poly 11 nylon 2 comfort stretch sourced from the world's finest mills Collar Button-down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available exclusively in tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Blue Buckley Performance Gingham Casual Shirt - Tailored
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This crisp gingham is a no-brainer Confidently tackle your commute travel or the rest of the workday thanks to the comfort stretch moisture-wicking and enhanced breathability of this performance blend End-on-end poplin is compactly woven and results in a clean cool feeling fabric Perfect for transitioning to warmer weather this easy-wearing gingham will be your go-to all Spring long Fabric 64 cotton 23 poly 11 nylon 2 comfort stretch sourced from the world's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Quintessential collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Charcoal Heather Denbigh Flannel Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Denbigh is no ordinary flannel Constructed with a unique plain weave that features a honeycomb-like look Perfect for layering due to its lightweight construction Pair with a navy sport coat for an effortless fall look or layer under a sweater Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Quintessential collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Navy Hughston Check Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>If you were looking for a holiday shirt this just might be it Crafted from a mid-weight densely woven twill The Hughston Check is a perfect layering base for winter Composed of a classic navy and green check you'll find countless opportunities to wear this casual check Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Sage Roslyn Gingham Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Mix up your whites and blues with a sage gingham This mid-weight compact twill is perfect for pairing with chinos and a sport coat or sweater Woven with mouline yarn the gingham has a heathered look and is ever so lightly brushed Upgrade your gingham this season Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Dark Blue Dorrington Flannel - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>You need this flannel Featuring a unique alternating end-on-end and twill weave this richly brushed flannel is a new favorite You'll be hard pressed to find a shirt as soft as this Pair with a favorite pair of jeans or moleskin pants to brave the cold this season Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe's finest mills Collar The Ledbury Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Navy Fordcroft Dobby Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Add this shirt to your must-have list This unique style features a deep indigo dye and dobby weave construction We love this style for its deep color soft handfeel and airy weight If you’re looking for some holiday blues for your winter wardrobe make sure The Fordcroft Dobby is top of your list Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Quintessential collar The perfect multi-purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid-spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>

Title: The Navy Bordley Check Casual Shirt - Classic
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>We’re excited about The Bordley Check This versatile shirt is a basketweave construction lending a lightweight casual feel to the fabric With a ticking stripe check running through the warp and weft the pattern boasts lots of visual detail Perfect for layering under a knit sport coat or sweater and can be dressed up or down with ease Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Europe’s finest mills Collar The Quintessential collar The perfect multi-purpose collar that works well in any setting A medium height mid-spread collar that looks great with or without a tie Finished with a canvased interlining to prevent collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt.~nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size & Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping & Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section></sections>
